revision.text:
{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Splash Plate |image = [[File:Splash_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Splash Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] [[Berry Master]] }}
==Description== '''Splash Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then be sold for 100 Water [[Gems]][[File:Water_Gem.png|15px]] or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day.
==Details== The Splash Plate is a [[Gem Plates|Gem Plate]] that can Either sold for 100 Water [[Gems]][[File:Water_Gem.png|15px]] or used on Daily Deals in the [[Underground]]
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]

==Details== The Splash Plate is a [[Gem Plates|Gem Plate]] that can Either sold for 100 Water [[Gems]][[File:Water_Gem.png|15px]] or used on Daily Deals in the [[Underground]]
